name: Roly Poly - Prototype
description:
Controls -

left paddle - left arrow key

right - right arrow key  

left mouse click on menu

Objective: Destroy the five orange squares

------

This was made for the "stop waiting for godot game" jam. This is less of a game and more of a prototype/proof of concept. However, I enjoyed working on it, and enjoyed the mechanics themselves so much that I fully intend to expand on it, and turn it into a full game. Due to life, I unfortunately ran out of time before i could really flesh it out for the jam, but please enjoy.
